channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Countess
channel.description:
**The Countess**
**Neutral Offensive**
**Royal Blood (Passive)** - Your vote to become King will count twice.
**Astute Mind (Passive)** - Immune to death at night once.
**Blackmail(Night)** - Your target will be unable to speak and vote the next day. Cannot use twice on the same target.- 3 uses
**Seduce(Night)** - Your target will be occupied and you will be notified if the target is BD.- Infinite uses
**Eavesdrop(Day)** - Hear whispers to and from target player.- Infinite uses
_Survive to see the Blue Dragon defeated._
**Info**:When the Countess becomes the King, she will be an Evil King.
**The Prosecutor**
**Neutral Investigative**
**Untouchable(Passive)** - Immune to death at night once, this will be lost when you achieve your objective.
**Lawful Visits(Passive)** - Your visits will be hidden from others at night.
**Interrogation(Night)** - Check if a player is a neutral.- Infinite Uses
**Prosecution(Night)** - Attack a player.- 3 uses.
_See the Countess die._

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Countess

BTW I would make the immunity one-shot

item.description:
The Countess

Neutral Offensive

Royal Blood (Passive) - Your vote to become King will count twice.

Astute Mind (Passive) - Immune to death at night once.

Blackmail(Night) - Your target will be unable to speak and vote the next day. Cannot use twice on the same target.- 3 uses

Seduce(Night) - Your target will be occupied and you will be notified if the target is BD.- Infinite uses

Eavesdrop(Day) - Hear whispers to and from target player.- Infinite uses

Survive to see the Blue Dragon defeated.

Info:When the Countess becomes the King, she will be an Evil King.

The Prosecutor

Neutral Investigative

Untouchable(Passive) - Immune to death at night once, this will be lost when you achieve your objective.

Lawful Visits(Passive) - Your visits will be hidden from others at night.

Interrogation(Night) - Check if a player is a neutral.- Infinite Uses

Prosecution(Night) - Attack a player.- 3 uses.
